entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:19 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 10:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near minus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
